spec_data.Name: perl-App-Cmd
spec_data.Description:
App::Cmd is intended to make it easy to write complex command-line
applications without having to think about most of the annoying things
usually involved.

For information on how to start using App::Cmd, see App::Cmd::Tutorial.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 06:59:19 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Write command line apps with less suffering
